about_the_game:
Keyless is a jump and run platformer, with very unique logic puzzles.

By starting the game you get into a dispute between logicians and poets.

As a result you lose access to the keys on your keyboard!

You will have to think differently than usual to regain control!

But don’t be afraid, you will understand. Finally. Just keep playing.

In KeyLess you will:

- have to fix the broken keyboard to continue playing,

- solve logic puzzles. KeyLess is mainly a jump-and-run puzzle adventure,

- look behind the facade of the dispute between poets and logicians,

- understand the strange plan to disable your keys,

- be forced to become part of the dispute,

- stumble across many mathematical peculiarities by the logicians, but also

- discover the corresponding and famous quotes from the poets.

Features:

- Beautiful music

- beautiful low-poly-grafic at the poets areas

- rigorous architecture at the logicians areas

- new to the world puzzles

- 2D as well as 3D movement

Warning: This is an Indie game! Expect the unexpected.

name: KeyLess

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Egal
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Egal
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard
